languages.text: "Сегодня я заметил одного из членов своей семьи в странном, не свойственном ему настроении. Гален Гапрак — мой троюродный племянник по отцу, сохрани Император его душу. Обычно сдержанный и собранный, сегодня Гален был суетлив и беспокоен, крутил в руках маленький лист бумаги и тщетно кого-то искал. Когда я видел его в последний раз, Гален направлялся к входной зале, где стоят алтари. Возможно, вам стоит поговорить с ним".

traits.locale_text: "Сегодня я заметил одного из членов своей семьи в странном, не свойственном ему настроении. Гален Гапрак — мой троюродный племянник по отцу, сохрани Император его душу. Обычно сдержанный и собранный, сегодня Гален был суетлив и беспокоен, крутил в руках маленький лист бумаги и тщетно кого-то искал. Когда я видел его в последний раз, Гален отправлялся к дворцовой молельне, где стоят алтари. Возможно, это будет важно для вас, Ваша Светлость, и для Астарции".
traits.speaker: YoungGaprak

languages.text: "Today, I noticed one of my family members to be in an odd, uncharacteristic mood. Halen Gaprak is my paternal second cousin once removed, may the Emperor save his soul. Usually reserved and self-possessed, today he was frantic and anxious, fidgeting with a small piece of paper and seemingly looking for someone to no avail. When I last saw him, he was headed to the entrance hall, where the altars are. Perhaps you should talk to him."
languages.original_text: "Сегодня я заметил одного из членов своей семьи в странном, не свойственном ему настроении. Гален Гапрак — мой троюродный племянник по отцу, сохрани Император его душу. Обычно сдержанный и собранный, сегодня Гален был суетлив и беспокоен, крутил в руках маленький лист бумаги и тщетно кого-то искал. Когда я видел его в последний раз, Гален направлялся к входной зале, где стоят алтари. Возможно, вам стоит поговорить с ним".

traits.locale_text: "Today, I have noticed one of my family members to be in an odd, uncharacteristic mood. Halen Gaprak is my paternal second cousin once removed, may Emperor save his soul. Usually reserved and disciplined, today he was frantic and anxious, fumbling in his hand a small piece of paper and looking for someone to no avail. When I last saw him, he was heading to the palace chapel, where the altars are. Perhaps you should talk to him."
traits.speaker: YoungGaprak

traits.locale_text: "Today, I have noticed one of my family members to be in an odd, uncharacteristic mood. Halen Gaprak is my paternal second cousin once removed, may Emperor save his soul. Usually reserved and disciplined, today he was frantic and anxious, fumbling in his hand a small piece of paper and looking for someone to no avail. When I last saw him, he was heading to the palace chapel, where the altars are. Perhaps you should talk to him."

traits.locale_text: "Today, I have noticed one of my family members to be in an odd, uncharacteristic mood. Halen Gaprak is my paternal second cousin once removed, may the Emperor save his soul. Usually reticent and disciplined, today he was all frantic and anxious, fidgeting with a small piece of paper and looking for someone but to no avail. When I last saw him, he was headed to the palace chapel, where the altars are. Perhaps you should talk to him."

When I last saw him, he was headed to the entrance hall, where the altars are. Perhaps you should talk to him."

traits.locale_text: "Today, I noticed one of my family members to be in an odd, uncharacteristic mood. Halen Gaprak is my paternal second cousin once removed, may the Emperor save his soul. Usually reserved and self-possessed, today he was frantic and anxious, fidgeting with a small piece of paper and seemingly looking for someone to no avail. When I last saw him, he was headed to the entrance hall, where the altars are. Perhaps you should talk to him."
traits.speaker: YoungGaprak

languages.text: 「今日、我が家のひとりが妙な、らしくない雰囲気を出しているんです。ヘイレン・ギャプラックは私の父方のまたいとこの子なのですが、皇帝が彼の魂をお救いくださいますよう。いつもは控え目で落ち着いているのですが、今日はずっと殺気立って不安げなのです。小さな紙切れをいじり回しては、いたずらに誰かを探しているようです。最後に彼を見た時は、祭壇のあるエントランスホールに向かっていました。陛下、ヘイレンと話をすべきではないでしょうか」
languages.original_text: "Today, I noticed one of my family members to be in an odd, uncharacteristic mood. Halen Gaprak is my paternal second cousin once removed, may the Emperor save his soul. Usually reserved and self-possessed, today he was frantic and anxious, fidgeting with a small piece of paper and seemingly looking for someone to no avail. When I last saw him, he was headed to the entrance hall, where the altars are. Perhaps you should talk to him."

traits.locale_text: 「今日、我が家のひとりが妙な、らしくない雰囲気を出しているんです。ヘイレン・ギャプラックは私の父方のまたいとこの子なのですが、皇帝が彼の魂をお救いくださいますよう。いつもは控え目で落ち着いているのですが、今日はずっと殺気立って不安げなのです。小さな紙切れをいじり回しては、いたずらに誰かを探しているようです。最後に彼を見た時は、祭壇のあるエントランスホールに向かっていました。陛下、ヘイレンと話をすべきではないでしょうか」
traits.speaker: YoungGaprak

languages.text: “就在今天，我注意到家里有人举止十分古怪。那个人是我远亲的二堂兄哈伦·贾帕克，愿神皇拯救他的灵魂。他平日很守规矩，为人沉默寡言，但今天却一副六神无主、火急火燎的样子。我看到他捏着一张小纸片，看起来像是在找什么人，但却没有找到。我最后一次见到他时，他正往祭坛的方向走去。我想您应该与他谈谈。”
languages.original_text: "Today, I noticed one of my family members to be in an odd, uncharacteristic mood. Halen Gaprak is my paternal second cousin once removed, may the Emperor save his soul. Usually reserved and self-possessed, today he was frantic and anxious, fidgeting with a small piece of paper and seemingly looking for someone to no avail. When I last saw him, he was headed to the entrance hall, where the altars are. Perhaps you should talk to him."

traits.locale_text: “就在今天，我注意到家里有人举止十分古怪。那个人是我远亲的二堂兄哈伦·贾帕克，愿神皇拯救他的灵魂。他平日很守规矩，为人沉默寡言，但今天却一副六神无主、火急火燎的样子。我看到他捏着一张小纸片，看起来像是在找什么人，但却没有找到。我最后一次见到他时，他正往宫殿小礼堂的祭坛走去。我想您应该与他谈谈。”
traits.speaker: YoungGaprak

languages.text: « Aujourd'hui, j'ai remarqué que l'un de mes parents se comportait de façon très étrange. Halen Gaprak est l'un des cousins issus de germains de mon père, que l'Empereur garde son âme. Lui qui est d'habitude si réservé et maître de lui était dans tous ses états. Il triturait un petit bout de papier et semblait chercher désespérément quelqu'un. La dernière fois que je l'ai vu, il se dirigeait vers le hall d'entrée, là où se trouvent les autels. Vous devriez peut-être aller lui parler. »
languages.original_text: "Today, I noticed one of my family members to be in an odd, uncharacteristic mood. Halen Gaprak is my paternal second cousin once removed, may the Emperor save his soul. Usually reserved and self-possessed, today he was frantic and anxious, fidgeting with a small piece of paper and seemingly looking for someone to no avail. When I last saw him, he was headed to the entrance hall, where the altars are. Perhaps you should talk to him."

traits.locale_text: « Aujourd'hui, j'ai remarqué que l'un de mes parents se comportait de façon très étrange. Halen Gaprak est l'un des cousins issus de germains de mon père, que l'Empereur garde son âme. Lui qui est d'habitude si réservé et discipliné était dans tous ses états. Il triturait un petit bout de papier et semblait chercher désespérément quelqu'un. La dernière fois que je l'ai vu, il se dirigeait vers la chapelle du palais, là où se trouvent les autels. Vous devriez peut-être aller lui parler. »
traits.speaker: YoungGaprak

languages.text: «Hoy he notado un comportamiento inusual en uno de los miembros de mi familia. Halen Gaprak es mi primo segundo paterno, que el Emperador salve su alma. Suele ser reservado y tranquilo, pero hoy le he visto inquieto y ansioso, jugueteando con un trozo pequeño de papel y buscando a alguien sin éxito. La última vez que le vi se dirigía a la capilla del palacio, donde los altares. Quizás debería ir a hablar con él».
languages.original_text: "Today, I noticed one of my family members to be in an odd, uncharacteristic mood. Halen Gaprak is my paternal second cousin once removed, may the Emperor save his soul. Usually reserved and self-possessed, today he was frantic and anxious, fidgeting with a small piece of paper and seemingly looking for someone to no avail. When I last saw him, he was headed to the entrance hall, where the altars are. Perhaps you should talk to him."

traits.locale_text: «Hoy he notado un comportamiento inusual en uno de los miembros de mi familia. Halen Gaprak es mi primo segundo paterno, que el Emperador salve su alma. Suele ser reservado y aplicado, pero hoy le he visto inquieto y ansioso, jugueteando con un trozo pequeño de papel y buscando a alguien sin parar. La última vez que le vi se dirigía a la capilla del palacio, donde los altares. Quizás debería ir a hablar con él».
traits.speaker: YoungGaprak

languages.text: "Mir ist heute aufgefallen, dass eines der Mitglieder meiner Familie in merkwürdiger, uncharakteristischer Stimmung war. Halen Gaprak ist mein Onkel dritten Grades väterlicherseits, möge der Imperator seine Seele retten. Meist ist er reserviert und selbstbeherrscht, doch heute war er ganz unruhig und aufgeregt, hat nervös mit einem Zettel Papier herumhantiert und offenbar vergeblich nach jemandem gesucht. Als ich ihn das letzte Mal gesehen habe, war er auf dem Weg zur Eingangshalle, wo die Altare sind. Vielleicht solltet Ihr mit ihm sprechen."
languages.original_text: "Today, I noticed one of my family members to be in an odd, uncharacteristic mood. Halen Gaprak is my paternal second cousin once removed, may the Emperor save his soul. Usually reserved and self-possessed, today he was frantic and anxious, fidgeting with a small piece of paper and seemingly looking for someone to no avail. When I last saw him, he was headed to the entrance hall, where the altars are. Perhaps you should talk to him."

traits.locale_text: "Mir ist heute aufgefallen, dass eines der Mitglieder meiner Familie in merkwürdiger, uncharakteristischer Stimmung war. Halen Gaprak ist mein Onkel dritten Grades väterlicherseits, möge der Imperator seine Seele retten. Meist ist er ruhig und diszipliniert, doch heute war er ganz unruhig und aufgeregt, hat nervös mit einem Zettel Papier herumhantiert und vergeblich nach jemandem sucht. Als ich ihn das letzte Mal gesehen habe, war er auf dem Weg zur Palastkapelle, wo die Altare sind. Vielleicht solltet Ihr mit ihm sprechen."
traits.speaker: YoungGaprak

languages.text: "Bugün hanemdekilerden birinin tuhaf ve sıra dışı bir ruh hâlinde olduğunu fark ettim. Halen Gaprak, baba tarafımdan kuzenim olur. İmparator korusun, kendisi genelde içe kapanık ve sakin biridir. Lakin bugün gergin ve hayli endişeliydi. Elindeki küçük kâğıt parçasıyla oynuyor, birini arayıp duruyordu. Son gördüğümde sunakların bulunduğu giriş salonuna doğru gidiyordu. Bence kendisiyle bir konuşmalısınız."
languages.original_text: "Today, I noticed one of my family members to be in an odd, uncharacteristic mood. Halen Gaprak is my paternal second cousin once removed, may the Emperor save his soul. Usually reserved and self-possessed, today he was frantic and anxious, fidgeting with a small piece of paper and seemingly looking for someone to no avail. When I last saw him, he was headed to the entrance hall, where the altars are. Perhaps you should talk to him."

traits.locale_text: "Bugün hane mensuplarımdan birinin tuhaf ve sıra dışı bir ruh hâlinde olduğunu fark ettim. Halen Gaprak, baba tarafımdan kuzenim olur. İmparator korusun, kendisi genelde içe kapanık ve sakin biridir. Lakin bugün gergin ve hayli endişeliydi. Elindeki küçük kâğıt parçasıyla oynuyor ve birini arayıp duruyordu. Son gördüğümde sunakların bulunduğu giriş salonuna doğru gidiyordu. Bence onunla konuşmalısınız."
traits.speaker: YoungGaprak
